message: Dan, I didn't say a word about all victims of violence. I will not fight with you however; instead I choose peace and will say a prayer for you. ¢½

I would like to go on the record, I don't care if you are gay, straight, trans, or any of the 50 other new things that a person can apparently be these days. Its none of my business, I don't want to tell you how to live any more than I want you to tell me how to live, but there is the problem your movement is trying to dictate how I , and more importantly, my children live. If I find a man in the bathroom with my daughter I can not guarantee they will be walking back out, not a threat just a fathers natural response to my child being in danger. Also I don't walk around advertising the particulars of my sex life, neither should you. If you try to force your agenda on my children I will resist you, and if you choose to go to War against the rights of those who choose to live as nature intended I will go to War.

I have no problem with that Andre. What I have a problem with is having my tax dollars funding it. She wants a recount, that's fine, then she pays for it. Because the fact of the matter is even by some miracle if Michigan or Wisconsin would change and flip and Pennsylvania does not, nothing changes!! The vote will be different after the recount, but it will be within what is expected for margin of error.
